topic.title: 도서관에서 책 찾기
topic.description: 도서관에서 원하는 책을 찾고 대출하는 방법에 대해 배우는 대화입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 네, 안녕하세요. 혹시 이 책을 찾는 것 좀 도와주실 수 있나요?
아, 그 책은 문학 섹션에 있을 거예요.
저쪽 복도를 따라가서 왼쪽으로 도시면 바로 보여요.
천만에요. 다른 도움이 필요하시면 언제든지 말씀하세요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, how can I help you?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | how can I help you?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hi. Could you help me find this book?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hi. || Could you help me find this book?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Ah, that book should be in the literature section.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Ah, | that book should be in the literature section.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Go down that aisle and turn left, you'll see it right there.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Go down that aisle | and turn left, || you'll see it right there.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I found it! Thank you so much.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I found it! || Thank you so much.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: You're welcome. If you need any other help, just let me know.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: You're welcome. || If you need any other help, | just let me know.

keyword_speeches.target_sentence: Could you help me find this book?
That book should be in the literature section.
If you need any other help, just let me know.
Could you help me find this book?
It should be in the literature section.
If you need any other help, just let me know.
Could you help me find this book?
Could you help me find this book?
That book should be in the literature section.
If you need any other help, just let me know.

learning_points.korean_phrase: 찾는 것 좀 도와주실 수 있나요

learning_points.foreign_phrase: should be in the literature section
If you need any other help

highlight_sentences.korean_text: 혹시 이 책을 찾는 것 좀 도와주실 수 있나요?
highlight_sentences.foreign_text: Could you help me find this book?
highlight_sentences.reason: 도움을 요청할 때 사용하는 매우 유용하고 공손한 표현입니다.
